creator: Brian.Kardell@ssiutilitysuite.com
text:
We are seeing this same behavior:

http://nagoya.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=6594

in Tomcat 4.1.24 - although it was supposedly fixed way before (see the bug for 
specifics).  How was it fixed? can it be again?  Are we just missing an updated 
jar or something?

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
This works quite happily for me.

Reviewing the patch for bug6594 it looks like the root cause was that some 
resources were not being released. Is it possible your app is doing something 
like this? I would suggest that the tomcat-user mailing list is the best place 
to follow this up.

If you do re-open this bug please provide the simplest possible test war that 
demonstrates the problem.
